text:
California Shatters single-day
Coronavirus record AGAIN!

35.6% of ALL California cases
happened in the last 2 weeks!

Sooooo...
if we’re closed when we were getting 1,000 a day. 

WHY THE FUCK ARE WE OPEN
WITH 6,000 A DAY?

@GavinNewsom
#TuesdayThoughts
